overview:
Senior Technology Executive

Joined Flypaper Studio at the beginning of 2005. Instrumental in the design, development and implementation of the Flypaper product and component architecture. Worked extensively in the information technology field for more than a decade. Architected, designed and managed key projects for several corporations including TeleSoft, Inc., Apollo Group - University of Phoenix, Applied Financial Solutions and First American. In addition, worked in the advertising and marketing sector for more than 5 years before involvement in the technology industry. Graduated Cum Laude with honors from Florida International University with a degree in Computer Science.

milestones.description: Developed Flypaper Studio's flagship commercial application, Flypaper.
